Package org.example

Class HairDryer

java.lang.Object
org.example.ElectricAppliance
org.example.HairDryer
public class HairDryer extends ElectricAppliance
Represents a HairDryer, a high-power kitchen appliance used intermittently.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description
    private final int
    speedSettings
    The number of speed settings available on the hair dryer.

  • Constructor Details

    • HairDryer

      public HairDryer(String name, int powerConsumptionW, double electromagneticRadiationLevel, int speedSettings)
      Constructor for HairDryer.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hair dryer.
      powerConsumptionW - The power consumed in Watts (high).
      electromagneticRadiationLevel - The EMR level (can be high).
      speedSettings - The number of speed settings available.
